content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, the rental price is €1,000 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry but I don't find this a suitable price for a 50 square meter, newly built, and yet-to-be-furnished one-bedroom apartment in an unspecified but presumably less-desirable area of the city, considering my cautious financial approach. I don't want to continue the negotiation, mainly due to the apparent significant price discrepancy. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
